channel.title: Pages on Monica Diaz
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Monica Diaz

item.description: Experience Automated QA Specialist | QHR Technologies (Jan 2023 – presente) Automate manual test cases using Playwright Report and track software defects using bug-tracking tools QA Insurance Analyst | Payslate (Sept 2021 – Dec 2022) Reduced test execution time by 75% by automating the API platform used by customers who integrate their system with the LETUS platform using Robot Framework and Selenium Coordinated QA activities for the for the payment processor migration of the main product, working with technical and non-technical business owners Developed and maintained automated scripts with python to improve the regression test cycle for UI main functionalities Performed mobile testing using BrowserStack platform and Databases testing using SQL Assisted with continued improvement of the performance testing process using JMeter Coordinated Junior QA member’s activities during the testing cycle Worked on the testing cycle.
